messages.title: Vote Liberal Democrat FOR A BRIGHTER FUTURE:
messages.content: Britain needs fresh vision and leadership to restore fairness in our country. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.

messages.title: A FAIRER BRITAIN
messages.content: Britain needs fresh vision and leadership to restore fairness in our country. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.

messages.title: TACKLE THE CLIMATE EMERGENCY
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will take the urgent actions needed to protect our climate, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green technologies.

messages.title: INVEST IN SCHOOLS AND OUR NHS
messages.content: As Prime Minister, Jo Swinson will work hard to ensure every child has the best start in life, schools get the funding they need and we change the future of the NHS after years of Conservative neglect.

messages.title: THE CHOICE HERE IS CLEAR:
messages.content: Sue Wixley and the Lib Dems OR Boris Johnson’s Conservatives. The Brexit Party in all but name according to Justine Greening. No longer the party of business. By backing a hard Brexit, the Conservatives are no longer a party that stands up for free enterprise.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Reverse Conservative cuts to our hospitals

community.content: Sue Wixley and the Lib Dems will reverse Conservative cuts to our hospitals. As Prime Minister, Jo Swinson will work hard to ensure every child has the best start in life, schools get the funding they need and we change the future of the NHS after years of Conservative neglect.

examples: Britain needs fresh vision and leadership to restore fairness in our country. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.
The Liberal Democrats will take the urgent actions needed to protect our climate, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green technologies.
The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.
The Brexit Party in all but name according to Justine Greening.

Boris Johnson’s Conservatives. The Brexit Party in all but name according to Justine Greening. No longer the party of business. By backing a hard Brexit, the Conservatives are no longer a party that stands up for free enterprise.
